Text: Transcribed Message from ISO Counsel re Document ProductionColleagues Attached hereto is Norma Formaneks transcribed voicemail message confirming that ISO will not produce documents to plaintiffs until after a protective order has been entered in whichever court this case winds up As discussed I propose to send the following confirming letter Thank you for your voicemail confirming that ISO is continuing to abide by our agreement that there will be no production of documents to plaintiffs counsel until after plaintiffs remand motion has been heard and we know which court will be entering the protective order that will preserve the confidentiality of documents that are produced Defense counsel are reviewing the proposed protective order and will provide comments in the near future Please let me know if you have any suggestions or changes Thanks Michael J Kass Pillsbury Winthrop LLP Fremont Street Room San Francisco CA TEL FAX email DOC
